diet_plan.name: Blueprint Protocol
diet_plan.description: A plant-based, science-backed diet regimen aimed at optimizing longevity and healthspan.

meals.name: Super Veggie
meals.description: A nutrient-dense meal featuring black lentils, broccoli, cauliflower, shiitake mushrooms, garlic, ginger, lime, cumin, apple cider vinegar, hemp seeds, and extra virgin olive oil.
meals.preparation: Cook lentils and vegetables until tender. Combine with spices, vinegar, and hemp seeds. Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

meals.name: Nutty Pudding
meals.description: A dessert rich in healthy fats and antioxidants, made with macadamia nut milk, ground nuts, seeds, berries, and pomegranate juice.
meals.preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

meals.name: Third Meal
meals.description: A flexible meal option consisting of vegetables, nuts, seeds, and berries, designed to be quick to prepare and rich in essential nutrients.
meals.preparation: Combine ingredients as desired. Can be served raw, steamed, or lightly saut√©ed.

supplements.name: Collagen Peptides
supplements.description: Supports skin elasticity and joint health.

supplements.name: Creatine
supplements.description: Enhances muscle strength and energy production.

supplements.name: Blueprint Stack
supplements.description: A combination of supplements tailored for longevity.
